meanings: (남의 죄를 뒤집어쓴>) scapegoat, (제물 ) sacrifice, sacrificial lamb, sacrificial victim

vlive.korean: 판타지 여러분들의 재미를 위해서라면 그 정도 희생할 수 있죠 저희? For the entertainment of FANTASY, we can sacrifice that much, right? 듣기 View video SF9 : o_o
vlive.english: For the entertainment of FANTASY, we can sacrifice that much, right?

vlive.korean: 그렇게 희생한 이유는... I did my best because... 듣기 View video TWICE : 먹방다시🐷🦋🦄🌈
'사랑은 희생이 아니야 네가 희생해' 이러면 그러면 어떡해요? "Love is not about sacrifice, you should..." What about this? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [FULL] HAYOUNG X LieV - 하영의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: "Love is not about sacrifice, you should..." What about this?

vlive.korean: [팀을 위해 당연한 듯 자기를 희생해줘서 고맙슴돠!] [and sacrificing yourself for the rest of us!] View video Stray Kids : [Two Kids Room(투키즈룸)] VOL.3 Ep.05 방찬 X 창빈
vlive.english: [and sacrificing yourself for the rest of us!]

vlive.korean: 분질러먹은 첫 번째 희생... The first one we broke... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [선데이 키즈] 빼빼로데이🖤

examples.english: Most of the victims were stifled by the fumes. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The victim was clubbed to death with a baseball bat. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 희생자는 야구 방망이에 맞아 죽었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: All terrorist crime is detestable, whoever the victims. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 희생자가 누구든 간에 모든 테러 범죄는 가증스러운 짓이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
